Sentencas: Ni-Al2O3 catalyst is modified with Li2O3, La2O3 and CaO promoters to improve its resistance to coking.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane

Sentencas: These catalysts are used as the materials of the anode catalyst layer in solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane

Sentencas: Their catalytic activity for the partial oxidation, steam reforming and CO2 reforming of methane at 600-850 degrees C is investigated.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane

Sentencas: Their catalytic stability and carbon deposition properties are also studied.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane

Sentencas: The LiLaNi-Al2O3 catalyst shows a catalytic activity that is comparable to those of LaNi-Al2O3 and LiNi-Al2O3 catalysts for all three reactions.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane

Sentencas: However, it displays a higher catalytic activity than those of CaLaNi-Al2O3 and CaNi-Al2O3 catalysts.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane

Sentencas: Among the various catalysts, the LiLaNi-Al2O3 catalyst presents the highest catalytic stability.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane

Sentencas: O-2-TPO profiles indicate that the modification of the Ni-Al2O3 catalyst with Li and La greatly reduces carbon deposition under pure methane atmosphere.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane

Sentencas: The LiLaNi-Al2O3 catalyst is applied as the anode functional layer of a Ni + ScSZ anode-supported fuel cell.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane

Sentencas: The cell is operated on methane-O-2, methane-H2O or methane-CO2 gas mixtures and yields peak power densities of 538,532 and 529 mW cm(-2) at 850 degrees C, respectively, comparable to that of hydrogen fuel.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane

Sentencas: In sum, the LiLaNi-Al2O3 is highly promising as a highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane
Lithium and lanthanum promoted Ni-Al2O3 as an active and highly coking resistant catalyst layer for solid-oxide fuel cells operating on methane
